author: PTI
title: New global platform launched to keep information networks 'safer, stronger' during COVID-19 pandemic
description: Telecommunication networks have never before been as vital to "our health and safety, and to keep our economy and society working" as they are during the current crisis, where millions are being encouraged to stay put at home, the UN believes.
content: The United Nations' telecom body has launched a new platform to help global networks remain "safer, stronger and more connected" during the current coronavirus crisis, where millions are being encouraged to stay put at home, according to the specialised agenc… [+2836 chars]
